ULL hcf(ULL a, ULL b)
{
	ULL x=max(a,b);
	ULL y=min(a,b);
	ULL prevy=y;
	while (y>=1)
	{
		prevy=y;
		y=x%y;
		x=prevy;
	}
	return prevy;
 
}
